price: Ergasii inni gara gabbaramtoota isaanii maqee “sila hin nyaattanuu?” jedheen.
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
